hero.subtitle: Student developer based in Manchester. Currently studying A-Levels in Computer Science, Maths, and Physics.

about.title: About
about.intro: Currently studying A-Level Computer Science, Mathematics and Physics. Working on various projects including a full database management system with a custom SQL variant for my NEA.

packagemanager.title: PackageManager
packagemanager.description: A lightweight CLI-based package manager written in Go. Created to allow easy installation of .tar.gz packages

busesinfo.title: Buses Info
busesinfo.description: Web application that presents college bus information and rankings in an accessible format. Improves on the existing system with better UX.

nea.title: MonoDB
nea.description: Full-featured database with custom SQL variant and management interface. Allows for SQL, NoSQL, and Redis style tables. Includes query optimization and transaction handling. (A-Level NEA Project)

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Available for interesting projects and opportunities.
